verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Zion is the place of singing,
Zion is the place of joy,
Zion is the dwelling of the Lord.
Zion is the place of worship,
Zion is the place of praise,
Zion is the dwelling of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So let us climb the hill to Zion,
The city of the living God,
To the city of the living God,
To the city of the living God,
So let us climb the hill to Zion,
The city of the living God,
For the ark of the testimony is in her midst.
